item.description:
Hi! Remember when we went to see String Theorie at the um... the um... well, the clock factory in Bristol?
Link to past event in January:http://www.meetup.com...

That was a great fun adventure....fording puddles and dark alleyways and secret factory rear
entrances!! BUT we never got to hear this awesome band play!! So, now is your chance. It is also the release party for their first CD!

Check them out on myspace: http://www.myspace.co...
and the event is on Facebook: http://www.facebook.c...
-----------------
From the band's email announcement:

String |||||| ||||| Theorie


[March 12 La Paloma]


Need we say more? Well, even if we needn't, we're going to anyway. After months of anticipation, String Theorie's debut EP is finally ready for release. And what better place to unleash the opus upon the world than our home away from home, La Paloma?


Well, since you didn't come up with an answer, La Paloma it is!


When: Friday, March 12, doors open at 7 PM.
Where: La Paloma Sabenera. 405 Capitol Ave, Hartford.
Who: You.
What: I thought we covered this.
Why: Why not?
How (much): $5
BYOB: That's not a question, but yes.
item.name: String Theorie CD Release Party March 12th
